title: Web Development Bootcamp
description: Learn full-stack web development from scratch using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.

title: Explore Space Science Workshop
description: Dive into the wonders of space, planets, and stars. Ideal for young explorers!

title: Creative Art & Painting Workshop
description: Unleash your creativity with brushes, colors, and a canvas. Open to all skill levels.

title: Sustainable Planting Workshop
description: A hands-on workshop focused on sustainable planting techniques, composting, and eco-friendly gardening practices for all age groups.

title: Self-Employment Skills Workshop
description: Gain insights into freelancing, small business setup, and sustainable self-employment tips.

title: Yoga for Adults
description: Relax your body and mind through guided yoga practices suitable for beginners and adults.

title: Robotics for Beginners
description: Hands-on workshop to introduce basic robotics concepts and simple robot building.

title: Mental Health Support for A/L Students
description: Focused on managing stress and exam pressure, this session is tailored for A/L students.

title: Photography Basics Workshop
description: Capture moments like a pro! Learn the fundamentals of photography and composition.

title: React JS Development Workshop
description: Master the fundamentals of React.js by building interactive user interfaces and learning key concepts like components, hooks, and state management.

title: Children's Learning Workshop
description: Interactive activities designed to boost creativity and cognitive skills in children aged 5-10.

title: Public Speaking for Teens
description: Build your public speaking and presentation skills in a supportive group setting.
